NOTE_FOR_TRANSLATORS: FOR ALL KEYWORDS: If your language has cases, the keyword NAMES must be lower case, or they won't match!

DESCRIPTION: 进入这一 #y姿态 时，失去 [W] [W] 。你不能改变 #y姿态 。你在下回合开始时自动离开这一 #y姿态 。

NOTE_FOR_TRANSLATORS: This is a keyword for the Devotion power from the base game.

DESCRIPTION: 黏液是耗能为1的 #y状态牌 。
NOTE_FOR_TRANSLATORS: This is a keyword for the Slimed curse from the base game.

DESCRIPTION: 蒸汽牌取材自你的药水，但效果较微弱。它们具有 保留 和 消耗 。
